channel.title: Image Representation Learning on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in Image Representation Learning on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: UDON: Universal Dynamic Online distillatioN for generic image representations
item.description: UDON: a novel multi-teacher online distillation method creates highly efficient universal image embeddings by dynamically transferring domain-specific knowledge and adapting to imbalanced data.
